summary: The familiar conflicts of a film director planning to make a movie about his life and the confrontation he has with his wife, an actress who was turned down for such project in which she wanted to play herself.
cast: Brigitte Sy|Philippe Garrel|Louis Garrel|Anémone|Maurice Garrel|Yvette Etiévant|Jacques Kébadian|Valérie Dréville|Aurélien Recoing|Pierre Romans|Charlotte Clamens|Laurent Wennig
title: Les baisers de secours
